name: botbuilder-adapter-trovo-heroku
description: An adapter to support Trovo.live chat using botkit and botbuilder. Mod for Heroku's slugs. CDP session is only available in Chromium.
keywords: bot, botkit, botbuilder, adapter, trovo, chat, heroku
author: unarmedguitar <unarmedguitar@protonmail.com> (https://github.com/unarmedguitar/)
